sentences.en: ...the Chernobyl disaster, which irradiated large parts of Europe.
sentences.cn: ...辐射了欧洲大部的切尔诺贝利灾难。

sentences.en: Also available is lineup of long - focus reflectors ( for air - cooled types only ) that irradiate UV light effectively.
sentences.cn: 也配备能够有效地照射UV光的长焦点型 ( 仅 风冷式 ) 反射板.

sentences.en: Avoid the using position where sunlight irradiate directly to avoid color changing.
sentences.cn: 作品使用位置避免阳光直射,以防止颜色发生变化.

sentences.en: Be covering that face seeming to have met before, be fearing to irradiate onlyly in dark.
sentences.cn: 黑暗之中遮盖着那张似曾相识的脸, 惧怕光的照射.

sentences.en: But some authors suggest to prophylactically irradiate the the whole neck.
sentences.cn: 但有些研究者主张行全颈预防照射.

sentences.en: Conclusion: It's effective to treat migraine with massage and irradiate with magical light.
sentences.cn: 结论: 推拿加神灯照射治疗偏头痛疗效显著.

sentences.en: In conducting polymer's electroluminescence, 75 % percent of injected carriers form triplet excitons, which can not irradiate.
sentences.cn: 在导电高聚物的有机发光中, 75%的注入载流子形成三重态激子, 但是三重态激子是不能自动发光的.

sentences.en: Irradiate isn't gone, it's just " Not in right now. "
sentences.cn: 辐射不是被砍掉了, 而只是 “ 现在不在游戏中 ”.

sentences.en: Maintaining a common heart , treating people honestly, being good - hearted make one irradiate beauty.
sentences.cn: 留学解答资讯网:保持平常心, 真诚待人, 心地善良,人就会透露出美丽.

sentences.en: Safety condition of using Nd - YAG laser to irradiate the esophagogastric andcolonic mucosa of dogs was studied.
sentences.cn: 应用成年犬研究Nd - YAG激光照射胃、大肠及食管粘膜的安全条件.

sentences.en: The hall is not dim; the four large lamps irradiate it.
sentences.cn: 厅内并不暗; 有四盏灯照耀着.

sentences.en: The technology to irradiate food has been around for the better part of a century.
sentences.cn: 在大半个世纪以来辐照食品的技术变得愈加突出.

sentences.en: This paper proposes an approach by means of bipolaron to make the triplet excitons irradiate.
sentences.cn: 本文提出一种途径,通过双极化子可使三重态激子发光.

sentences.en: We irradiate the desert with slow neutrons.
sentences.cn: 我们用低速中子照射整个沙漠.

trans.tran_cn: 照耀；使灿烂；启发；放射；使某物生辉
trans.tran_en: if someone or something is irradiated,  x-rays  or  radioactive  beams are passed through them

trans.tran_cn: 照耀，发光，变得光辉灿烂，使明白，启发，阐明，用X射线，紫外线或日光等照射，[物]辐照
